name: Mountain Offroad Simulator
description:
Put on your safety helmet because we're starting a new off-road adventure right now!

Mountain Offroad Simulator offers you a new challenge. With the help of 2 pick-ups you have to discover the beauties of the nature, combining them with the spirit of competition. Be very careful where you drive, because the jeeps are quite expensive.

Your mission is to complete in a limited time each level without falling from the dangerous mountains.
Game Features:
- More than 20 levels
- 2 Offroad Jeeps
- Limited time to complete each mission
